text: Ahmad ibn Tawoos (), also known as "Tawoos" or "al-Taus" (died 673), was one of the Tabi‘in, and one of the narrators of hadith. ==References== Category:Tabi‘un Category:Tabi‘un hadith narrators Category:673 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown Category:7th-century Arabs
title: Ahmad ibn Tawoos
